alert.note: Alert for Florence (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 4:22PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Florence County through 515 PM EDT... At 420 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms from near Timmonsville to Olanta, or 10 miles southwest of Florence, moving east at 10 to 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is also possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Lake City, Timmonsville, Sardis, Effingham, Friendfield, Claussen, New Hope, Evergreen, Scranton, Coward and Olanta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, then consider seeking shelter inside a building until the storms pass.
